messages.subject: PMK Okita statuette, and Burai
messages.msgSnippet: An alert fan notified me that Amazon Japan has upgraded or resolved whatever existing problems there were with the ordering system and that ordering is now
messages.messageBody:
An alert fan notified me that Amazon Japan has upgraded or resolved
whatever existing problems there were with the ordering system and
that ordering is now much easier for us non-Japanese speaking folks.

New PMK figure for Okita Souji:
http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/obidos/ASIN/486127124X/qid=1102608224/ref
=pd_ka_0/250-9652696-0601009


Also, I wanted to ask if people can list what attempts were made to
translate Burai into English? Working on a side project now with
Burai so need to know.

Thanks
S
